title: Ping issues
body: Hey, I've been getting some crazy ping issues during my games where my base ping is 60-70, it can fluctuate into 100-200 and at extreme times it can go over 3000 for a few moments. I've been hearing that its an issue with Florida (where I am located) and I've tried closing all other programs and restarting everything, but nothing seems to work. Any advice on what to do? trying to climb this summer lol

replies.body:
While it is true that some ISP's in Florida are experiencing routing issues to our servers causing in higher than normal ping, it shouldn't be causing the massive ping spikes you are describing.  This may be a result of something else entirely regarding your connection.  To hopefully resolve this, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664).  It has the most common solutions to this type of issue.

Let me know if you are still experiencing these same spikes!
